name: Katalyo
description: Katalyo is a no-code cross-chain platform for building hybrid blockchain powered applications. With Katalyo individuals and organisations can build blockchain powered applications without writing a single line of code. On top of no-code features for building web based frontend, by using Katalyo platform people can create tokens and NFTs, build DeFi applications, include smart contract execution in any part of the workflow. KTLYO is a utility token used to enable and consume service of the platform inluding NFT creation and cross-chain transfers.
